string.value: #p1032001# said that #t4161050# has already been borrowed by #b#p1052106##k from #b#m103000000##k. He asks that you get the book from #p1052106# and return it to him after reading it. Go to #m103000000#.
You asked #p1052106# in #m103000000# about #t4161050# but he says that he already let #b#p1002100##k in #bLith Harbor#k borrow it...

Ah, I've finished reading and now I'm bored. Hm? A book? Ah, you mean #t4161050#, yes? I thought I'd be able to fly with wings like a Dragon if I read that book, but I was wrong, so I stopped reading. You need it?\r\n#b#L0#Yes. I'll return it for you so hand it over if you're done with the book.#l\n#k

#b#p1002100##k in #b#m104000000##k needed the book so I gave it to her. She said she'd return it for me. So go see #m104000000# because I don't have it anymore.\r\n#b#L0#(Ugh, it's more work than you thought it'd be.)#l\n#k

Wait, what is that thing flying next to you? That's a strange-looking lizard. Whoa, it flies too? Impressive. Can you let me borrow that lizard? I want to study it... Just for a little while...\r\n#L0##bAbsolutely not!#l\n#k
Fine, you meanie... Fine, fine. I think flying with small wings looks silly anyway.
Haven't you gone to see that boy #p1052106#? #b#p1052106##k in #b#m103000000##k probably has #t4161050#.
